title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2522.10 - Surcharges for submetered electricity or other utility service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2522.10 - Surcharges for submetered electricity or other utility service

State Regulations

Where an owner acts as a provider of a utility service
(including, but not limited to electricity, gas, cable, or telecommunications), the owner may collect surcharges which shall not be part of the legal regulated
rent, and shall not be subject to this Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2522.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
